name: F Acorn Helm
description: Entry-level Felyne Palico head armor. The look that defined a generation!

name: F Bherna Hood
description: A hat that snugly swaddles the head in protective fabrics. Great for highland work.

name: F Alloy Helm
description: A product of quality ore and three nights of labor. Guaranteed head protection.

name: F Bone Helm
description: Head armor made out of a monster skull. Awakens a Palico's wild side.

name: F Jaggi Helm
description: Popular head armor made from supple Great Jaggi hide. Affords reliable protection.

name: F Hunting Helm
description: Kokoto's iconic headgear, retrofitted for Palico use. Conveys an old-school vibe.

name: F Mafumofu Hood
description: Specially made head armor from snowy Pokke Village. Felynes love its warm, fluffy feel.

name: F Yukumo Kasa
description: Head armor fashioned from Yukumo wood and bark. Don't leave home without it!

name: F Alta Hat
description: There isn't a better friend in the fight against bright sunlight than this hat!

name: F Rheno Helm
description: High-tech head armor that fuses metal to Rhenoplos shell. Note the cute face.

name: F Bnaha Cap
description: Sunglasses that alleviate the sun's rays AND Dragon and Thunder attacks.

name: F Maccao Helm
description: A stylish feathered helm that takes proper fashion sense to wear well.

name: F Velociprey Helm
description: A hat that folds up nice and cleanly. Tailor-made for the best fit.

name: F Bulldrome Mask
description: Head armor that looks ready to charge off one's head. Creates a small stink radius.

name: F Arzuros Helm
description: Head armor that was nearly discontinued after wearers were mistaken for Arzuros.

name: F Genprey Helm
description: A soft, comfy cap that can be worn all sorts of ways, but best with one end up.

name: F Cephalos Hat
description: Cephalos headwear with a scarlet ribbon. Full of hope (and food, if hope fails).

name: F Stone Head
description: A mask based on a statue the Meownster Hunters found. Feels positively ancient.

name: F Venombee Cap
description: For cool cats too rad to take their sunglasses off indoors, look no further.

name: F Gourmet Toque
description: A chef's hat that matches that of the Gourmew Chef's, right down to its size.

name: F Moofy Head
description: A helmet that looks just like a baby Moofah. Long neck not included.

name: F Aptonoth Mask
description: While handy for Aptonoth cosplaying, this mask also protects the face well.

name: F Popo Head
description: These handy tusks work well at scaring off potential predators on the prowl.

name: F Gargwa Mask
description: A bird mask that whips up carnivores' appetites. Has high Dragon Resistance.

name: F Ioprey Helm
description: A hat that can't help but stand out. Ideal for playing pretend as a general.

name: F Lagombi Helm
description: Fur head armor that keeps the wearer's face warm even in sub-zero temperatures.

name: F Kut-Ku Mask
description: A delightful take on the Yian Kut-Ku... Delightful, or just plain creepy.

name: F Gypceros Crest
description: August headwear with a wise gaze. The crest is said to glow when the gods return.

name: F Cabra Horn
description: A beefy Tetsucabra horn and fluffy mane. Turns wearers into legendary fiends.

name: F Daimyo Mask
description: Headwear made from red, durable plating. The Palico looks out through the mouth.

name: F Ludroth Helm
description: Solid head armor whose spongy Royal Ludroth bits boost Water Resistance.

name: F Khezu Cap
description: Head armor that seems too cute to be Khezu. It's hard not to fall in love!

name: F Nibel Helm
description: Stealth head armor that prevents the climate from foiling Palico missions.

name: F Scholarly Cap
description: A cap matching the one the Wycademy Gal wears. It simply oozes intelligence.

name: F Derring Galea
description: Glamorous head armor for your Palico's debut. They can wear it with pride.

name: F Edel Pigtails
description: These sweet-scented pigtails are a big hit with even the biggest monsters.

name: F Kittendant Hood
description: A Flight Kittendant cap. Putting it on is sure to make passengers take notice!

name: F Mosgharl Hat
description: A get-up rascal Felynes use to spook villagers. Turns out it makes good armor, too!

name: F Larinoth Mask
description: This mask's lofty face makes it impossible to tell where the wearer's eyes are.

name: F Death Stench Hood
description: A hood so reminiscent of the grim reaper, passers-by make their peace.

name: F Marauder Helm
description: The helm of a Felyne who sought to rule all. The paw- print boosts Palico morale.

name: F Volvi Helm
description: Shell armor revered as a bearer of Fire. Sells out before every festival.

name: F Malfestio Mask
description: A mask made from Malfestio Scraps. Its eyes are more than a little eerie.

name: F Rathian Helm
description: A symbol of ferocity and pride that yields remarkable Defense and Fire Resistance.

name: F Blango Mask
description: Dancing with this creepy mask on is thought to ward off evil spirits.

name: F Ceanataur Mask
description: The Shogun Ceanataur's angular head makes for a tight-fitting mask.

name: F Naja Turban
description: A turban that makes Palicoes shout, "Come on! Snake my day!" Often ends in tragedy.

name: F Narga Helm
description: Head armor themed after the black garb of the East. Enables shadowy approaches.

name: F Maiden Hood
description: A hood modeled after the Kokoto Gal, designed with big ears in mind.

name: F Helper Hood
description: The tavern girl's hood refitted for Palicoes, right down to the last ornament.

name: F Pretty Toque
description: A Quest Counter favorite in Yukumo Village. Makes every hunter say, "Hire me!"

name: F Chaos Bulbs
description: Be a vision -- or just see them -- with this beguiling 'shroom and ribbon headband.

name: F El Dora Helm
description: Any Palico would be proud to wear this feathered Meownster Hunter treasure.

name: F Artian Core
description: A highly sturdy Palico helm made from a mysterious mined metal.

name: F Garuga Hood
description: Sage headwear that a foreign tactician might wear. Not your standard Palico hairdo!

name: F Uragaan Helm
description: Unparalleled head defense, but it makes reading your Palico's mood a chore.

name: F Rathalos Helm
description: Head armor as wild and regal as the King of the Skies. Quiets the fiercest of Fire.

name: F Lagia Tricorne
description: A pirate hat that unleashes a Palico's inner buccaneer. Tends to sell out quickly.

name: F Astalos Mask
description: The crevices in this mask allow Palicoes to both see and breathe in it.

name: F Gammoth Collar
description: This collar is so insulated that the heat it retains travels the whole body.

name: F Mizutsune Kasa
description: The distinct conical hat and fetching mask make this a hit at festivals.

name: F Guild Headgear
description: Guild-order armor given only to pure hearts who have sworn to help those in need.

name: F Glavenus Helm
description: This helm was forged in such high heat, it'd likely withstand the flames of hell itself.

name: F Zinogre Helm
description: Head armor that makes every living thing shrink away. Unlock the inner behemoth.

name: F Gore Horror
description: Head armor worn during the Magala eclipse. The wearer must face burning despair.

name: F Seregios Helm
description: Head armor made of shining Seregios plates. The gleaming blades promise victory.

name: F Tigrex Helm
description: A symbol of the Tigrex's vindictive nature. May even bite the wearer's hand.

name: F Kirin Horn
description: The Palico Kirin equipment hunters have clamored for. Wear the horn with pride!

name: F Brachy Headgear
description: Knockout headgear for would- be pugilists. Turn your Palico into a contender!

name: F Angel Halo
description: Head armor worn at the gods' resurrection. Wearers witness the light of hope.

name: F Kushala Glare
description: Head armor that honors the god of the moon and harvest. Brings blessings and glory.

name: F Genie Helm
description: Head armor imbued with mystic Chameleos power. Helps one grant their master's wishes.

name: F Kaiser Periwig
description: Noble Teostra wear. Golden locks? Check. Regal crown? Check. Sterling rep? Check!

name: F Husk Mask
description: Beneath this perturbing mask that's gone to hell and back lies a lost Palico soul.

name: F Acorn Helm S
description: Entry-level Felyne Palico head armor. The look that defined a generation!

name: F Bherna Hood S
description: A hat that snugly swaddles the head in protective fabrics. Great for highland work.

name: F Hunting Helm S
description: Kokoto's iconic headgear, retrofitted for Palico use. Conveys an old-school vibe.

name: F Yukumo Kasa S
description: Head armor fashioned from Yukumo wood and bark. Don't leave home without it!

description: A chef's hat that matches that of the Gourmew Chef's, right down to its size.

description: A helmet that looks just like a baby Moofah. Long neck not included.

description: This mask's lofty face makes it impossible to tell where the wearer's eyes are.

description: Headgear based on a baby Tigrex. The only time it's okay to put your head in a Tigrex's mouth.

description: A mask based on a Felyne that lives in a legendary village. Talk about culture shock!

name: F Meowniac's Mask
description: Headgear that turns you into Meowniac, the Monster Hunter fan club mascot.

name: F Pep Squad Cap
description: A wild hat the fan club's pep squad uses to encourage hunters in any situation.

name: F Giaprey Helm
description: A snuggly hat for out in the snow. The fluffy material is as soft as can be.

name: F Conga Steeple
description: A pointed hat whose proud, pink puff makes a Palico feel pretty darned special.

name: F Barroth Helm
description: Outstanding head armor that transforms the wearer into a rock-solid baby Barroth.

name: F Pleasant Ribbons
description: The Meowstress's hair. A faithful copy of her do, so you'll look just like her!

name: F Wisdom Hat
description: A splendid hat worn by the Wyventurer. Filled with the spirit of inquiry.

name: F Basarios Helm
description: Rock-hard head armor. The Palico's pointy ears wreck an otherwise viable disguise.

name: F Scylla Mask
description: A mask that covers the head. The opaque goggles are too cool for Palico school.

name: F Cheerful Cap
description: Headwear for your Palico reminiscent of the Soaratorium Gal. A youthful hat with a fresh design.

name: F Mariner Hood
description: Headwear worn by Tanzia Gong Girls. The hat ribbon completes the look.

name: F Barioth Helm
description: Head armor made from a snow- field predator. So regal, it calms crying children.

name: F Grav Mask
description: Gloomy headwear that glows from beneath with magma. Lets one navigate toxic gases.

name: F Diablos Helm
description: Horns full of fighting spirit. In a world of prey, be the predator.

name: F Valstrax Helm
description: Head armor for those with the courage to face calamity. It twinkles like the stars.

name: F Acorn Helm X
description: Entry-level Felyne Palico head armor. The look that defined a generation!

name: F Bherna Hood X
description: A hat that snugly swaddles the head in protective fabrics. Great for highland work.

name: F Gourmet Toque X
description: A chef's hat that matches that of the Gourmew Chef's, right down to its size.

name: F Moofy Head X
description: A helmet that looks just like a baby Moofah. Long neck not included.

name: F Aptonoth Mask X
description: While handy for Aptonoth cosplaying, this mask also protects the face well.

name: F Popo Head X
description: These handy tusks work well at scaring off potential predators on the prowl.

name: F Gargwa Mask X
description: A bird mask that whips up carnivores' appetites. Has high Dragon Resistance.

name: F Larinoth Mask X
description: This mask's lofty face makes it impossible to tell where the wearer's eyes are.

name: F Alloy Helm X
description: A product of quality ore and three nights of labor. Guaranteed head protection.

name: F Bone Helm X
description: Head armor made out of a monster skull. Awakens a Palico's wild side.

name: F Alta Hat X
description: There isn't a better friend in the fight against bright sunlight than this hat!

name: F Bnaha Cap X
description: Head armor that alleviates the sun's rays AND Dragon and Thunder attacks.

name: F Jaggi Helm X
description: Popular head armor made from supple Great Jaggi hide. Affords reliable protection.

name: F Rheno Helm X
description: High-tech head armor that fuses metal to Rhenoplos shell. Note the cute face.

name: F Slagtoth Hood X
description: Hide head armor marketed as a "rainy day requisite." Strong against Water.

name: F Maccao Helm X
description: A stylish feathered helm that takes proper fashion sense to wear well.

name: F Velociprey Helm X
description: A hat that folds up nice and cleanly. Tailor-made for the best fit.

name: F Bulldrome Mask X
description: Head armor that looks ready to charge off one's head. Creates a small stink radius.

name: F Arzuros Helm X
description: Head armor that was nearly discontinued after wearers were mistaken for Arzuros.

name: F Giaprey Helm X
description: A snuggly hat for out in the snow. The fluffy material is as soft as can be.

name: F Genprey Helm X
description: A soft, comfy cap that can be worn all sorts of ways, but best with one end up.

name: F Lagombi Helm X
description: Fur head armor that keeps the wearer's face warm even in sub-zero temperatures.

name: F Cephalos Hat X
description: Cephalos headwear with a scarlet ribbon. Full of hope (and food, if hope fails).

name: F Kut-Ku Mask X
description: A delightful take on the Yian Kut-Ku... Delightful, or just plain creepy.

name: F Gypceros Crest X
description: August headwear with a wise gaze. The crest is said to glow when the gods return.

name: F Cabra Horn X
description: A beefy Tetsucabra horn and fluffy mane. Turns wearers into legendary fiends.

name: F Daimyo Mask X
description: Headwear made from red, durable plating. The Palico looks out through the mouth.

name: F Ludroth Helm X
description: Solid head armor whose spongy Royal Ludroth bits boost Water Resistance.

name: F Kecha Cap X

name: F Maiden Hood X

name: F Exquisite Toque

name: F Ladybug Cap X
description: Head armor as cute as it is capable. Note the adorable feelers on the top.

name: F Odd Pincer Mask

name: F Lecturer's Hood X
description: Wear this hood, and just feel the monster smarts come pouring in!

name: F Stone God Head
description: A mask based on a statue the Meownster Hunters found. Feels positively ancient.

name: F Venombee Cap X

name: F Mosgharl Hat X

name: F Marauder Helm X
description: The helm of a Felyne who sought to rule all. The paw- print boosts Palico morale.

name: F Pleasant Ribbons X
description: The Meowstress's hair. A faithful copy of her do, so you'll look just like her!

name: F Wisdom Hat X
description: A splendid hat worn by the Wyventurer. Filled with the spirit of inquiry.

name: F Postman Beret X
description: A perfect replica of the Courier's hat. Its horn has been disabled to avoid bothering the neighbors.

name: F Ioprey Helm X
description: A hat that can't help but stand out. Ideal for playing pretend as a general.

name: F Volvi Helm X
description: Shell armor revered as a bearer of Fire. Sells out before every festival.

name: F Basarios Helm X
description: Rock-hard head armor. The Palico's pointy ears wreck an otherwise viable disguise.

name: F Conga Steeple X
description: A pointed hat whose proud, pink puff makes a Palico feel pretty darned special.

name: F Barroth Helm X
description: Outstanding head armor that transforms the wearer into a rock-solid baby Barroth.

name: F Rathian Helm X

name: F Grandpaw D Guise
description: "Use this suit to turn into me, Grandpa Danger! Fight all the world's dangers!"

name: F Happy Guise
description: A suit resembling a being from a distant land. Brings good fortune to the hunt.

name: F Dark Meowgic Robe
description: A black robe worn by a famous mage. It is a necessary item for any duel.

name: F Booty Chest J
description: A treasure chest found at the end of a long journey. It is filled with hopes and dreams.

name: F Buccaneer Vest J
description: Durable attire that protects from the sea's dangers (and includes a treasure chest).

name: F King Suit J
description: A suit with a wheel that was "borrowed" from port. This pirate thing has to stop...

name: F Avaricious Bones J
description: What remains of a pirate who never gave up on his fortune. His spirit lives on within.

name: F Super Catboard
description: I am Catboard. When I fight, it's like a flood meets a flame. I'm super strong!

name: F Monqlo Shirt S
description: A shirt from everyone's favorite brand, Monqlo! The latest in Palico fashion!

name: F Link Tunic
description: The clothing of a boy who embarked on a grand adventure. It smells oddly like the ocean.

name: F Fox Suit
description: A flight suit based on a pilot that protects the galaxy. The thick tail look is all the rage.

name: F Mario Overalls
description: Duds worn by one of the bros who saved the Mushroom King- dom. They're a little loose.

name: F Luigi Overalls
description: Duds worn by one of the bros who saved the Mushroom King- dom. Note the longer straps.

name: F Resetti Guise
description: A Reset Surveillance Center employee costume. There is no Reset button in hunting!

name: F Isabelle Guise
description: A costume that turns one into an adorable town assistant that hunters love to be around.

name: F Armor of Purrity
description: Armor fashioned after one worn by the Palico of Purrity. The crystals protect the wearer.

name: F Chun Attire
description: A slitted dress, allowing the wearer to unleash stylish kicks with ease.

name: F Fancy Blanka Wear
description: Tough hide that personifies what it means to be a wild child with a heart of gold.

name: F Dante Jacket
description: A beautiful red jacket that gives the wearer unparalleled freedom. Keeping it stylin'!

name: F Mega Armor
description: Special combat armor designed to stop a mad scientist. It features awesome powers.

name: F Melodic Suit
description: Attire covered with musical note patterns. All but screams, "I'm a conductor!"

name: F Baby Tiga Suit S
description: Clothing based on a baby Tigrex. Perfect for making Tigrex buddies!

name: F Sunsnug Vest
description: A vest worn by somebody famous in the legendary Felyne Village. Talk about culture shock!

name: F Fan Top
description: A cool pink tracksuit and a bag with a Rathalos scale on it. A fan club original!

name: F Pep Squad Suit
description: A fan club uniform Palicoes wear beclaws their hunters need a little cheering on.

name: F Giaprey Mail
description: Chest armor for cool cats. Purrfect for cosplaying a soldier or the like.

name: F Conga Fete
description: Mirthful cymbals that say, "Here I come!" and a shroom bag that says, "Here I AM!"

name: F Barroth Mail
description: Tremendous body armor that transforms the wearer into a rock-solid baby Barroth.

name: F Pleasant Dress
description: The Meowstress's dress. Wear to get the same great service you've come to know.

name: F Wisdom Cloak
description: A splendid cloak worn by the Wyventurer. Thick yet light, and a joy to wear.

name: F Basarios Mail
description: Basarios armor that pretty much turns Palicoes into rocks when they hunch down.

name: F Scylla Mail
description: A suit that covers the body. Painstakingly crafted, it possesses a wondrous beauty.

name: F Cheerful Suit
description: Clothes for your Palico reminiscent of the Soaratorium Gal. Shows off both your smarts and liveliness.

name: F Mariner Suit
description: Body armor worn by Tanzia Gong Girls. Popular for its undeniable cuteness.

name: F Barioth Mail
description: Body armor made from an icy predator. The white pelt blends right into the snow.

name: F Grav Armor
description: Armor that says, "If the Gravios can take a magma bath -- dang it, so can I."

name: F Diablos Mail
description: Shell body armor that repels iron blows and renders the wearer a terror of the sand.

name: F Valstrax Mail
description: Chest armor for those with the courage to face calamity. Fills all who see it with awe.

name: F Acorn Mail X
description: Entry-level Felyne Palico body armor. An acorn a day keeps the monsters away!

name: F Bherna Mail X
description: Bherna Village-crafted clothing well-renowned for its durability and flexibility.

name: F Gourmet Suit X
description: A chef's getup resembling the Gourmew Chef in his younger days.

name: F Moofy Suit X
description: Made from so much Moofah cotton that one could easily fall asleep wearing it.

name: F Aptonoth Suit X
description: A potentially all too tasty- looking suit. Watch out for monsters nibbling the tail!

name: F Popo Wear X
description: Demand for this armor is high thanks to its simplicity and high maneuverability.

name: F Gargwa Vest X
description: Feathered body armor with Dragon Resistance. A.K.A., the "dragon in bird's clothes."

name: F Larinoth Suit X
description: The Larinoth's time to shine has come at last with this popular, adorable suit.

name: F Barrel Body
description: Body armor that the felyne cook used for smuggling. Always snugly smuggly.

name: F Alloy Mail X
description: A product of quality ore and three nights of labor. Guaranteed body protection.

name: F Bone Mail X
description: Body armor made of a variety of monster bones. Look wild, smell wild...then go wild!

name: F Alta Shirt X
description: A breezy tank top perfect for fine weather. Complete with a basket of Thunderbugs.

name: F Bnaha Suit X
description: A suit with great mobility. Dance like a butterfly, sting like a Felyne!

name: F Jaggi Mail X
description: Popular body armor made of Great Jaggi hide. Provides mobility and defense.

name: F Rheno Mail X
description: Revolutionary armor made by fusing metal to Rhenoplos shell. Light, but sturdy.

name: F Slagtoth Cape X
description: Hide body armor marketed as "inundation insurance." Strong against Water.

name: F Maccao Mail X
description: An irresistibly adorable bell and cape combo that's sure to turn heads.

name: F Velociprey Mail X
description: Clean, elegant armor that's perfect for playing pretend as a combat medic.

name: F Bulldrome Vest X
description: Body armor that leverages the Bulldrome's thick skin. Stinks like its namesake.

name: F Arzuros Mail X
description: Body armor that may cause Arzuros to mistake the wearer for its young...

name: F Giaprey Mail X
description: Chest armor for cool cats. Purrfect for cosplaying a soldier or the like.

name: F Genprey Mail X
description: Armor that comes with a pair of binoculars. Good to play pretend as a scout.

name: F Lagombi Mail X
description: Fur body armor that shuts out cold for toasty hunts even in the worst of climes.

name: F Cephalos Dress X
description: A grand collar that cuts a fine figure, whether sailing open skies or open seas.

name: F Kut-Ku Wear X
description: A pint-sized take on the Yian Kut-Ku that's ahead... er, WAY ahead of its time.

name: F Gypceros Cloth X
description: Gypceros armor woven from ancient technology. The trim gives off a divine light.

name: F Cabra Wrap X
description: Fiendish Tetsucabra wear. Count the seconds from when it's seen 'til thunder hits!

name: F Daimyo Suit X
description: Presenting the Daimyo Felyne. A Monoblos horn on the sack keeps foes from sneaking up.

name: F Ludroth Mail X
description: Soft body armor whose spongy Royal Ludroth bits help absorb Water attacks.

name: F Kecha Coat X
description: Woven body armor modeled after the coat worn by one of the Three Meowsketeers.

name: F Maiden Mail X
description: A Palico outfit that proudly declares an interest in artisanal work.

name: F Exquisite Robe
description: A charming robe fashioned after what's worn by the Yukumo Gal. A real hit with Palicoes.

name: F Ladybug Wings X
description: Body armor covered in polka dots. Its only downside: You can't fly with it.

name: F Hot Shakalaka Duds
description: Shakalaka wear that dares you not to dance in it. Minimal clothing, maximum defense.

name: F Large Straw Raincoat
description: A Shakalaka style-fest made from sparkly shells. Comes with its own funky groove.

name: F Lecturer's Suit X
description: Even the Guildmarm this suit's based on is jealous of that sweet frog pack!

name: F Stone God Body
description: Armor made from part of an old stone statue that exudes mysterious power.

name: F Venombee Wings X
description: The shiny metal stinger looks cool and all -- just try not to poke anybody.

name: F Mosgharl Mail X
description: A get-up that rascal Felynes use to spook villagers...and, as it turns out, monsters!

name: F Marauder Armor X
description: Armor of a Felyne who sought to rule all. The blossom-on- black pattern stirs foes.

name: F Pleasant Dress X
description: The Meowstress's dress. Wear to get the same great service you've come to know.

name: F Wisdom Cloak X
description: A splendid cloak worn by the Wyventurer. Thick yet light, and a joy to wear.

name: F Postman Suit X
description: Courier attire that's so authentic, you'll find yourself being handed letters to deliver!

name: F Ioprey Mail X
description: A noble looking set of mail befitting one pretending to be a tasty sacrifice.

name: F Volvi Mail X
description: Shell armor that girds the wearer against Fire, which becomes cool to the touch.

name: F Basarios Mail X
description: Basarios armor that pretty much turns Palicoes into rocks when they hunch down.

name: F Conga Fete X
description: Mirthful cymbals that say, "Here I come!" and a shroom bag that says, "Here I AM!"

name: F Barroth Mail X
description: Tremendous body armor that transforms the wearer into a rock-solid baby Barroth.

name: F Khezu Smock X
description: Body armor that seems too cute to be Khezu. Here comes the angel of the hunt!

name: F Nibel Mail X
description: Versatile body armor for getting around undetected. Orders are orders!

name: F Malfestio Mail X
description: The Malfestio plumage attached to this mail flutters dramatically in the breeze.

name: F Rathian Mail X
description: Body armor made of strong, supple shell. As unbreakable as a Rathian's spirit.

name: F Blango Garb X
description: A traditional outfit in cold regions, the drum is needed to keep spirits at bay.

name: F Ceanataur Suit X
description: This suit not only makes one feel like a boss, it's even got room for a power lunch!

name: F Scylla Armor X
description: A suit that covers the body. Painstakingly crafted, it possesses a wondrous beauty.

name: F Naja Sirwal X
description: Clothing that makes Palicoes yell, "I'm gonna rattle you, snake!" and then regret it.

name: F Narga Mail X
description: Body armor themed after the black garb of the East. Enables silent approaches.

name: F Zamtrios Suit X
description: Experimental body armor for harsh climes. Makes under- water Felvine easy to grab.

name: F Plesioth Suit X
description: Body armor with a pawprint on the chest that sells even to Palicoes who can't swim.

name: F Kut-Ku Wear XR
description: Armor made from Hyper Yian Kut-Ku Scraps. Truly peerless in its capabilities.

name: F Gypceros Cloth XR

name: F Ludroth Mail XR

name: F Scholarly Suit X

name: F Kittendant Suit X

name: F Derring Lorica X
description: Vivid orange-and-green body armor for your Palico's debut. Musters courage.

name: F Transpurrrrter Cape
description: The Transpurrter's slick travel wear, which flaps in the wind and makes soothing bell sounds.

name: F Guide's Suit X
description: Adorable and popular garb worn by the Felyne guides of Loc Lac, city of sand.

name: F Sailor Suit X

name: F Grand Chaos Skirt

name: F Death Stench Coat X
description: An outfit so spooky it sends chills down the spine of even the stoutest onlooker.

name: F El Dora Mail X
description: The studs on this armor give off a resplendent light no Felyne can resist.

name: F Artian Gear X
description: The materials in this suit inexplicably magnetize, keeping Palicoes afloat.

name: F Cheerful Suit X
description: Clothes for your Palico reminiscent of the Soaratorium Gal. Shows off both your smarts and liveliness.

name: F Mariner Suit X
description: Armor worn by Tanzia Gong Girls. Popular for its undeniable cuteness.

name: F Cute Dress

name: F Gammoth Coat X

name: F Mizutsune Suit X

name: F Barioth Mail X

name: F Grav Armor X

name: F Tigrex Mail X

name: F Kirin Vest X
